RHaP.branching module¶

RHaP.branching.branch_classification(thres)[source]¶

Predict the extent of branching

Parameters

thres (array) – thresholded image to be analysed

Returns

  • skel (array) – skeletonised image

  • is_main – help

  • BLF (int/float) – branch length fraction
